alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:44AM MDT until July 30 at 10:30AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CORSON AND NORTHEASTERN DEWEY COUNTIES... At 944 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spring Lake, or 8 miles northeast of Timber Lake, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trail City, White Horse and Promise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
